name: payorLinksV1
description: If the payor is set up as part of a hierarchy you can use this API to traverse the hierarchy

descendantsOfPayor.description: The Payor ID from which to start the query to show all descendants

parentOfPayor.description: Query for the parent payor details for this payor id

fields.description:
List of additional Payor fields to include in the response for each Payor

The values of payorId and payorName are always included for each Payor by default

You can add fields to the response for each payor by including them in the fields parameter separated by commas

The supported fields are any combination of: primaryContactEmail,kycState

$ul: **correlationId**: a unique identifier to track a request or related sequence of requests
**httpStatusCode**: this will mirror the Status-Code part of the Status-Line http response header and is included for extra clarity
